label: Can be filled by Internal Transfer/ Promotion
name: Job Requisition-custom_requisition_by

default:
• All recruitment requisition procedure will be worked on after the final approvals by the approval authorities.
    • Requisition form duly completed by immediate supervisor & approved respective department HOD will be submitted to the Company ‘s chief Coordinator . Further which will be submitted to the HR Department after the final approval from the MD. 
    • No direct requisition will be entertained for any position without the authorized requisition form. 
    • This form is to facilitate the recruitment process thought proper channel by informing HR Department of their intent to recruit for a position. 
    • It is mandatory to fill all of the above details in the Requisition Form. As further recruitment will be preceded as per details provided in the form. Any later changes required by the HOD in the requisition need be approved by the approval authorities . 
    • Recruitment will be done as per the time frame given below :

       Level 1 (Managerial Positions & Above - 3 months)
       Level 2 (Asst. Managerial Positions & below - 2 month)
       Level 3 (Engineer, Executive, Supervisor Entry Level - 1 month)
label: Requisition Procedure
name: Job Requisition-custom_requisition_procedure

label: When position can be filled up
name: Job Requisition-custom_when_position_can_be_filled_up
